remarks: The composition of a one-arg function with a curried function is continuous.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnmptk1.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmptk1.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
cnmptk1.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( TopOn ` Z ) ) $.
cnmpt1k.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( TopOn ` W ) ) $.
cnmpt1k.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( J Cn L ) ) $.
cnmpt1k.b $e |- ( ph -> ( y e. Y |-> ( z e. Z |-> B ) ) e. ( K Cn ( M ^ko L ) ) ) $.
cnmpt1k.c $e |- ( z = A -> B = C ) $.
cnmpt1k $p |- ( ph -> ( y e. Y |-> ( x e. X |-> C ) ) e. ( K Cn ( M ^ko J ) ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B x $.
$d C z $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d Z x y z $.
$d ph x y $.
